import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import data from '../data'; function ProductScreen(props){ const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const dispatch = useDispatch; useEffect(() => { dispatch(detailsProduct()); return() => { } }, []) return
